name: Vegaman
description:
You have to shoot as many non vegan guys (or women) as you can with your apples within the given time (in order to convert them to veganism).
New "weapons" will be available during the game, you can purchase them with the seeds left on the ground by each guys you've converted.

KEYBOARD:

  • Move : ZQSD, WASD or arrows
  • Left Mouse Click : Shoot
  • Right Mouse Click : Dodge

CONTROLLER:

  • LT : dodge
  • RT : Shoot

TEAM:

  • Thomas Baron - Programmation
  • Sylvain Guerrero  - Programmation / FX
  • Mojo  - 2D Artist 
  • nonamenosocks  - 2D Artist / Animation
  • Grizzly Cogs  - Music / Sound-design

This is a 48h jam game, the subject was "eat apples" (postjam version)
